title: Can’t make it to Korea? Your local cinema has you covered!

replies.body: No tasmania :(
tasmania isn't in australia that's why
Neither is Auckland
ROFLMAOAOAOAOAOAA
Got no skin code here (EVENT Cinemas - Innaloo (57 Liege Street, Innaloo, WA, 6018)) :( :( :(

Hey Ice Age, confirming that the skin code will be emailed out by Event in the next few days. Technical limitations mean they can only be sent out after the viewing party. Sorry for the confusion here!
thank good sir!
What about village cinemas in melbourne?
are they sent to the email that you used for purchasing tickets or the email of your league account?
I think they're meant to get emailed to everybody who purchased an online ticket. The swag bag is a separate thing.
Don’t think so, ordered mine online and didn’t receive a skin code at all...
Thing is almost everyone there ordered tickets online and did not get any email regarding skin codes

>There are some technical limitations that mean the codes can only be sent out AFTER the viewing - apologies for the confusion, we need to be better about setting expectations here.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/6jGZAhT1/d/FO615RxE?comment=0006

It might be a day or two.
Got none at Marion (SA)

At Sydney screening today but none of us heard or received Ashe's skin code :) The bag has everything but the code for her skin lol
The staff at Event also confused when someone brought that up :)
Went to the EVENT Cinemas - Marion screening and didn't get any sort of skin code actual sucks this really annoyed me when I went.
I was at Marion too, didn't get any code either. Was looking through my bag for any sort of code for 15 minutes, pity.
just got out of innaloo event cinemas but with no skin code? how exactly were we meant to get them because it* wasnt in the swag bag
Also, those of us there that actually saw worlds did so on our phones.
At the Innaloo Event Cinemas in WA? How come? The stream seemed fine to me?
Oops, seems I replied to the wrong comment, was at the Sydney screening
How bout south island :(
The NZ screening doesn't include the Ashe Skin. Feels bad.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
what do u mean no ashe skin?

Going to the Events Cinemas NZ site, then finding the Worlds 2018 Finals Viewing Party page, it says that the Cosmic Ashe Skin isn't included in the swag bag (as compared to the Events Cinemas AUS site)

So, I'm to assume that NZ doesn't get the skin code.

Hey Crux, thanks for flagging this! This was just a mistake in the text on the website - players attending the NZ screenings absolutely will be receiving the Cosmic Queen Ashe skin code! 

The text on the Event NZ site should be updated soon.
Hey achenar I don't think the Event NZ site did end up updating and no players (at least the group I went with) received a skin code in the bag.
I can't find where I was meant to receive my Cosmic Queen Ashe skin. No code in the bag and no code on the email. Nani?
Same went to the staff at the theaters and they didnt even know what I was talking about.
ＮＯ　ＣＡＮＢＥＲＲＡ！！！！
theres no screening for ACT{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
None in the capital of NZ?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

It sucks there couldn't be more screenings, but they're limited by what cinemas (and this year what EVENT cinemas) can receive live satellite feeds. Yes Wellington is the capital, but Auckland has 8x the population, they are much more likely to have compatible locations simply because of demand.

Barring any other less apparent reason, it seems they may have partnered with EVENT this year to mix up the location from their normal partnership with HOYTS, so that's something at least.
zzzz as if they cant give both the chance to screen, nothing about offering something for people, the result was the opposite ..

Hey
Anyone who didn't get a code, check the email you used to order the tickets. I just got an email from cinebuzz club with the skin code.

Hey Righteous, I added you.
I’m still trying to talk to customer support about the code but it’s not really going anywhere.
If you don’t have anyone else to give it to and are happy to I’d love to take it

Hi 0GURU,

If you purchased your tickets online then you should have received an email with your codes, but Event have informed us that players who un-ticked the "send me promos/discounts" box you typically see with online forms, would not have been sent their skin codes.

We're just following up to absolutely confirm this was the case for the reported cases we're seeing, and then we'll work on a solution for the remaining players once we've confirmed this.

You can help with this by forwarding your ticket purchase receipt to ocelivereports@riotgames.com
We'll then follow up with Event to figure out why you did not received a code.

Thanks Gehirn
This is something I typically untick when purchasing things online.
I’ve forwarded my original response now

I've now replied with your code, and we also confirmed that unticking that promo email box had no effect on whether or not players received their codes. So the cause of players not receiving them is still a mystery, unfortunately.
Thank you, I've received the email and have added your case to the list that we'll investigate.

Thanks for the info, if you see this could you share some more?
What viewing party did you attend?
I ask as I was in Sydney and did not receive a code (likely due to refunds being given)

> [{quoted}](name=0GURU,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=lR43KZnY,comment-id=002c0000,timestamp=2018-11-05T12:51:17.759+0000)
>
> Thanks for the info, if you see this could you share some more?
> What viewing party did you attend?
> I ask as I was in Sydney and did not receive a code (likely due to refunds being given)

So i was at garden city, queensland. There were no issues with the stream apart from like the screen slightly bugging for about a second  during the opening so nothing major.

 After the games finished, there was no news from riot or event about the codes so i went home a bit bummed but oh well. I checked this page and there was nothing and i gave up.

 Out of the blue yesterday i find an email from event cinemas containing the code. Funny enough, i got a second email from event 2 hours ago with another code for cosmic queen ashe.

They won’t give us our codes but they give others 2!
I’ve been contacting LoL support about it and they are being sympathetic, however unproductive

> [{quoted}](name=0GURU,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=lR43KZnY,comment-id=002c000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-06T11:15:53.001+0000)
>
> They won’t give us our codes but they give others 2!
> I’ve been contacting LoL support about it and they are being sympathetic, however unproductive

That is indeed unfortunate, though it was probably an error on their part. If you give up, just add me and I can send it to you, if you like.
Can anyone confirm if Melbourne's event contains the Ashe skin and bag also?
Hi Hyoshen, sorry about the late reply on this! I've confirmed that the viewing party at Village Cinemas in Melbourne should include the swag bag and skin code as well.
why watch it at the cinema when i can watch it at home its the same, theres no advantage unless you watch it live at the stadium

There's the crowd of like minded people with a shared interest who also boost the hype, cool free stuff, and also the cinema experience. If all you have at home is a 13" laptop, then watching it on a cinema sized screen is a huge step up.

Can't go since it's during exams :(

Have fun everyone who's going {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
